name: SCORM Objects
description: The SCORM Objects Brightspace Data Set describes all the SCORM objects that exist, and which course and which topic they are located in. At time of launch, this data set contains data from July 2020 onwards. Remaining baseline data will be filled in upon a future release. Returned Fields

columns.name: ScormObjectId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the SCORM object.

columns.name: ContentObjectId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the content topic.

columns.name: ContentServiceContentId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the associated content in content service.

columns.name: ContentServiceRevisionId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the associated revision in content service.

columns.name: ContentServiceTopicId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the associated topic in content service.

columns.name: Title
columns.description: The title of the SCORM object. Field can be null.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: The description of the SCORM package. Field can be null.

columns.name: LearningStandard
columns.description: The learning standard used by the SCORM content, one of SCORM_11, SCORM_12, SCORM_2004_2ND_EDITION, SCORM_2004_3RD_EDITION, SCORM_2004_4TH_EDITION, AICC, XAPI, CMI5. Field can be null.

columns.name: LastModified
columns.description: Date when the SCORM content was last modified (UTC).

columns.name: LastModifiedBy
columns.description: User that last modified this SCORM object.
